name: Yaodong Huang
content: Yaodong Huang Homepage Yaodong Huang Assistant Professor, Ph.D. College of Computer Science and Software Engineering Shenzhen University Office: Zhiteng Building 621-1Email: yd.huang[at]szu.edu.cn Short Bio Yaodong Huang is an assistant professor at the School of Computer Science and Software Engineering, Shenzhen University, Shenzhen, Guangdong, China. He received Ph.D degree from the Stony Brook University in 2021. His current research interests are edge computing, cloud computing and mobile computing, including communication protocols, cooperative caching, security, privacy, energy efficiency, virtualization, and novel network architectures in edge and cloud computing.
